## EXERCISE 2

```{r hw1-ex2}
# remove this comment and add the code for Exercise 2 here
nrow(filter(edibnb, neighbourhood  == "Old Town", price > 100))
# 494
#Calculate the minimum, maximum, and average price from the Airbnb properties in Southside for a single night stay for four people. (Note, four people can stay in a property for four or more people.) (3 pts)

prices_data <- filter(edibnb, neighbourhood == "Southside", accommodates >= 4)

minimum_price = min(prices_data$price)
maximum_price = max(prices_data$price)
mean_price = mean(prices_data$price)

minimum_price
maximum_price
mean_price

# minimum, maximum, and average price are 10, 800 and 153.1368 respectively 

```
